verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I lift my hands, to the coming King,
To the great 'I AM', to You I sing,
For Your the One, who reigns within my heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I will serve no foreign god,
Or any other treasure; You are my heart's desire,
Spirit without measure.
Unto Your Name I will bring my sacrifice.
